original_text:
And when he had been summoned, Tertullus began to accuse him, saying:
“Since through you we enjoy much peace, and since by your foresight, most excellent Felix, reforms are being made for this nation,

sentences.original_text: And when he had been summoned,
Tertullus began to accuse him, saying:
Since through you we enjoy much peace,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신을 통해 우리가 큰 평화를 누리고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: reforms are being made for this nation,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 민족을 위해 개혁이 이루어지고 있기 때문입니다,
